definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: four (NH = BH; MI:8 [[ארבען]] = 40; Ph. [[ארבע]], Pun. [[ארבעת]], four; so As. arba’u (rarely irba’), irbitti; Ar. 0’arba9un, 0’arba9ah;un; Sab. [[ארבעת]] CIS:iv, no. 232.2 Hom:Chrest. 47; Eth. 0arb49:: 0arb49t:: Aram. [[אַרְבַּע]], [[אַרְבְּעָה]], 0arba9, 0arb9o0; Nab. [[אַרְבַּע]], Palm. [[ארבל]], [[ארבעא]], Lzb:367);—

definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: ) [[אַרְבַּע]] (abs. vel cstr.) Ex 21:37 +; also [[אַרְבַָּע]] Le 11:20 +; note (Baer Gi) Jos 21:18 +6 t. Jos 21 (van d.

definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: ) abs. [[אַרְבָּעָה]] Ge 2:10 + 125 t. + Pr 30:18 (v. supr.); cstr. [[אַרְבַּ֫עַת]] 1Sa 4:2 + 29 t., incl. Ez Eze 7:2 (but rd.

definitions.title: m.
definitions.body: Kt); sf. [[אַרְבַּעְתָּם]] Ez Eze 1:8 + 5t. Ez, [[אַרְבַּעְתָּן]] Eze 1:10, Eze 1:10 (but rd. prob. [[תָּם]]-, Krae), v:Eze 1:16, v:Eze 1:18; du. [[אַרְבַּעְתָָּיִם]] 2Sa 12:6, v.

definitions.title: 1 d;
definitions.body: pl. [[אַרְבָּעִים]] = 40, v. infr.;—four (in Hex. 108 t., chiefly P, 98 t.; Ez 52 t., Ch 47 t.):—

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[אַרְבַּ֫עַת]] (1) bef. n. mpl. Ju Jdg 11:40, 1Ki 7:32 + 11 t. (not Ez Eze 7:2, v. supr.), + [[אֲלָפִים]] ´[[א]]: = 4000, 1Sa 4:2 + 14 t. † (2) bef. coll. [[הַבָּקָר ]] Nu 7:7. † (3) n. om. 2Sa 21:22. † (4) c. sf., after n. pl., = the four of them, Ez Eze 1:8, Eze 1:10, Eze 1:10, Eze 1:10 + 6 t. Ez, Da 1:17 these boys, the four of them.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: du. [[אַרְבַּעְתָָּיִם]] 2Sa 12:6 = four-fold Ges:§ 98 h Kö:11. 1. 227, but read [[שִׁבְעָתָָיִם]] LXX Th We Klo Dr Kmp Bu HPS.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: (1) [[אַרְבַּע עֶשְׂרֵה]] = 14, (a) before n. fs., [[שָׁנָה]] ´[[ע]] :´[[א]]: Ge 31:41, + (as ordinal, = 14th) Ge 14:5, 2Ki 18:13v = Is 36:l, Ez Eze 40:1. (b) after n. fpl.´[[ע]] :´[[עָרִים א]]: Jos 15:36 + 8 t., ´[[ע]] :´[[נָשִׁים א]]: 2Ch 13:21. (2) [[אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר]] = 14, (a) before n. ms. Nu 17:14 (14 x 1000), Job 42:12; esp. (as ord.) [[יוֹם]] ´[[ע]] :´[[א]]: 14th day Ex 12:6, Ex 12:18 + 7 t. (b) bef. n. mpl. Nu 29:15. (g) after, n.mpl. Nu 29:13, Nu 29:17 + 6 t. (d) after n. ms. Es 9:15, Es 9:19, Es 9:21, all = 14th (e) ´[[ע]] :´[[א]]: pred. of [[נֶפֶשׁ]] Ge 46:22. z ´[[ע]] :´[[א]]: = 14th (sc. day) Le 23:15, 2Ch 30:15 + 6 t.
